title: Bronze 5
body:
Roit i just finished my 10 starter ranked games and won 7 out of 3 of them and i got bronze V????
I don't userly play ranked but after playing blind and team builder for some long i started to get better than my pairs and so i wanted something harder and played my games and i got put in the lowest league.
last year i did my 10 games and i only won 2 out of my 10 so of corse i got low but winning 70% of my games and getting the same possession is kind of disappointing.
i just want to know is there any way out of bronze V with out having to waste lots of my time climbing the leader bourd????{{item:3070}}

replies.body: My other friend got 9/1 in his preliminary but still got bronze 5, must be becoz you were vsing bronze 5 or just last season.
ok thank u guys alot this is realy help full
What order did you win and lose your games?

Took me the lesser part of a week to climb to silver after getting bronze 4 in placements. I think if you have a positive mind set and at least one champ you can play solid for every role you will get there easy. GL HF with the climb mate!
Bronze 5... but how should it change my league now?

The "reset" is a soft reset. It puts you somewhere between your original rank and Silver III or so, but closer to the original rank than Silver III. Depending on how low you were (i.e. if you were Bronze V 0 LP) you'll end up pretty low.

I'm guessing you were right at the bottom last season so you ended up being put close to that.

Where you get placed is irrelevant anyway. Focus on improvement and you'll naturally rise. I was at your rank (Bronze V) when I started ranked too, it's not hard to get out if you have a positive mindset.
And what rank were you last season? Bronze 4 or 5 im guessing?
Probably. Even if poster was higher, it is more than likely he had that level MMR.
